ProgramTermApplnTimeline.name: ProgramTermApplnTimeline
ProgramTermApplnTimeline.description: Represents a junction between Academic Term, Application Timeline, and Learning Program objects.

AcademicTermId.description: The associated Academic Term for which the program is being offered.

ApplicationTimelineId.description: The associated Application Timeline that determines when admissions to the program for this term are open.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningProgramId.description: The associated Learning Program which is accepting students for admission.

LearningProgramPlanId.description: The Learning Program Plan associated with the timeline.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.
